entities.name: polyjuice potion
entities.description: The Polyjuice Potion is mentioned as 167. It is a magical potion that allows the drinker to assume the appearance of someone else.

entities.name: ron weasley
entities.description: Ron Weasley's jaw dropped in response to Crabbe's gormless face. He was also clenching Crabbe's fists in anger.

entities.name: crabbe
entities.description: Crabbe is described as having a 'gormless' face and his gigantic fists were being clenched by Ron Weasley.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is mentioned as not noticing Crabbe's gormless face. He also snapped at Goyle and said he didn't know anything about the Chamber of Secrets.

entities.name: goyle
entities.description: Goyle was snapped at by Malfoy for asking if he knew who was behind the Polyjuice Potion.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is mentioned as thinking fast and trying to deflect attention from himself. He also shot a warning look at Ron Weasley.

entities.name: granger
entities.description: Granger is mentioned as a 'Mudblood' who died last time the Chamber of Secrets was opened. Malfoy expressed hope that it would be her who dies this time.

relationships.description: Malfoy snapped at Goyle for asking if he knew who was behind the Polyjuice Potion.
Harry Potter shot a warning look at Ron Weasley to prevent him from punching Malfoy.
